reviews.review_msg: Professor John is a supportive educator. He is kind, approachable, and always provides constructive feedback. I struggled with geography, but his guidance helped me improve significantly. His passion for teaching makes his classes both engaging and informative. I highly recommend him to anyone looking to deepen their understanding of geography.

Like others say John is really kind person. He helped me so much. I had to work hard for this course but now I know how to create a really good plan to write an essay. Be ready to work but know you will be better for it!

This is one of the heaviest classes I've ever taken at SFU. John is a very sweet person, but I've never had any prof and T.A. expect so much work out of a student and so many assignments, I fell behind in my other classes as a result. Avoid taking this class if you can.

This class flat out sucked. I am sure John is a nice person but he can't teach and made this class so hard. This is a fun topic and shouldn't be made to feel like torture to learn. John was a really hard marker and wasn't considerate when students needed extensions. I would strongly recommend avoiding this class and take it with a different prof.
